original_title: Sri Lanka announces squad for T20 World Cup 2024
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Cricket Selection Committee has unveiled the much-anticipated 15-member squad set to represent the nation in the upcoming ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
Under the captaincy of Wanindu Hasaranga, and with Charith Asalanka serving as the vice-captain, the team boasts a formidable lineup comprising seasoned veterans and promising young talents.
